## AttributeDefinition.setValue() method

Sets the value of the attribute/property on the source element.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setValue(source: HTMLElement, newValue: any): void;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

HTMLElement


</td><td>

The source element to access.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

newValue


</td><td>

any


</td><td>

</tbody></table>

void
